channel.title: Imagine losing all of your software
channel.description: Im no encouraging pirated software, but, Im sure all of you have something. My dad has just made me uninstall all of mine... that means no photoshop, no dreamweaver, no imageready, no ACDSee no AVG pro... The list goes on. How would you feel if all your best software dissapeared?

item.title: Imagine losing all of your software
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“m0u53m4t, post:1, topic:9880”]Im no encouraging pirated software, but, Im sure all of you have something. My dad has just made me uninstall all of mine… that means no photoshop, no dreamweaver, no imageready, no ACDSee no AVG pro… The list goes on. How would you feel if all your best software dissapeared?[/quote]How would I feel? Well, first I’d ask myself… what made me format my computer? And then I’d reinstall it.

Read full topic
item.source: Imagine losing all of your software

item.title: Imagine losing all of your software
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Exershio, post:16, topic:9880”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=14311.msg162708#msg162708 date=1155853315]
Software I’m ok with, now, if I had to delete my fucking films downloaded, I’d kill someone. THEN use therecomp to download 3 weeks worth of stuff.

I’d get them back from my backups. o_0

How do you backup a 5 GB+ game?

How do you backup a 13gb anime for that matter?
[/quote]
Read up a few posts.[/quote]

I did.

Read full topic
